body.p: present: [3.] jíhīte jíhate etc. V.+ jihīthām
secondary: passive: hāyate -- intensive: jāhā- -- desiderative: jihīṣate -- causative: hāpayati etc. ajīhapat

This is only the middle conjugation of 1hā, with the signification slightly weakened or generalized. The forms of the two cannot everywhere be distinctly separated, and one or two of the derivatives given under 1hā have an equal or better claim to be placed here. Compare also √hās, which is a secondary form of hā (doubtless through the aorist-stem).
